bcl:preamble.bcl:text: Whereas the letters patent governing each of the 28 regional districts within the Province contain or make provision for tax formulas based on assessed values for other than general municipal purposes in respect of functions and for specified areas permitted under or by virtue of the Local Government Act ("Act") and letters patent;

bcl:section.bcl:text: In order to continue the tax formulas according their original intent, the tax rate limits for all regional districts are amended in the manner set out in the schedule.

bcl:schedule.bcl:indent2: (a) each Part applies only to the regional district named in the heading of the Part, and

(b) the existing tax rate limits, expressed in terms of mills, set out in Column 2 of each Part for the function or specified area appearing opposite it in Column 1 are deleted, and the tax rate limits set out in Column 3, expressed in terms of dollars per thousand dollars, are substituted.
